name: ANT-ipiece
description:
~ Developed for the Vancouver Film School Game Jam ~

~ March 10-12 2023 ~

~ Theme: Flower Power ~

ANT-ipiece is a top-down tower defense/survival game, in which the player controls a bee that must kill ants to keep their flowers safe. By going to a central flower the bee collects pollen that they can use to either heal their other flowers or shoot at ants to kill them. The player needs to travel back and forth to collect pollen and check on their flowers to protect them from the ants. The ant invasion doesn’t stop until all the flowers are destroyed.

~ The Development Team ~

Cameron Nodrick - General Artist / 3D Environment Artist

Cole Fuller - VFX / 3D Character Artist

Felipe  Holanda - Gameplay Programming / Design

Frank Xu - Design / UI Programming

Juan Carrillo - Tech Art / Design

Sean Lynch - Project Manager / UI Programming

Zayle Radomi - 3D Artist / Gameplay Programming
